title: As a BOC Admin User, I want to see a Drug Test History widget on player's profiles
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a BOC Admin

Wire:
https://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=contracts

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+History+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the Contract & Investigations tab of player profiles (both intl amatuer and professional)
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a Drug Test Request History widget
AND The widget will only appear if the player has Drug Test Requests (it will never appear empty)
AND Only users with Intl BOC Drug Test permissions will see this widget:
       **ebis-intl-boc-drugtesting-admin-role**
       **ebis-intl-boc-drugtesting-viewer-role**
AND The widget will not be editable
AND The widget will match the provided wire and data discovery

title: As a Tester, I want test that the BOC's Drug Request Form Statuses Were Updated Properly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a Tester

State Flow and Mapping:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/State+Flow+and+Mapping

BOC Widget Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+BOC+-+Data+Discovery

Reg Analyst Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+Reg+Analyst+-+Data+Discovery

Club Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+Club+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the BOC Drug Request Form
custom_expected: THEN the statuses were updated properly

custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is a Tester

State Flow and Mapping:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/State+Flow+and+Mapping

title: As a Drug Testing User, I want EBIS to Send Request Information to the Drug Testing System (DTS) through a messaging Queue
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Drug Testing User is logged in

Reqs:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=138959058
custom_steps: WHEN processing a Drug Test request
custom_expected:
THEN EBIS will send request information to DTS through a messaging queue
AND the collector will be able to locate the player and process the request

title: As a Drug Testing User, I want the Drug Testing System (DTS) to Send Information to EBIS through a messaging queue
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Drug Testing User is logged in
AND EBIS received data points from DTS

Reqs:https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Testing+System+%28DTS%29+to+EBIS
custom_expected:
THEN the messaging queue is set up
AND a listener to process the request is set up
AND the requests in the database are updated

title: Doctor Utility Widget Permisions
custom_steps:
New LDAP Groups;
ebis-widget-doctorutility-viewers
ebis-widget-doctorutility-editors

Role Assignments:
ebis-widget-doctorutility-viewers
 -- ebis-proplayer-boc-viewer-role
 -- ebis-proplayer-club-viewer-role

ebis-widget-doctorutility-editors
 -- ebis-proplayer-boc-admin-role
 -- ebis-proplayer-club-admin-role

title: As a User, I want to view a Doctor Utility widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club

Wire:
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=doctors

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Doctor+Utility+Widget+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the Employees tab of the Rosters dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a "Doctor Utility" widget
AND The widget will be located at the bottom of the tab, below the Translator Utility widget
AND The widget will match the provided wire and data discovery
AND Export to excel should work
AND Filters and sorting should be retained

title: As a User, I want to edit the Doctors widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club

Wire:
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=doctors

Date Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Doctor+Utility+Widget+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the Doctors widget
custom_expected:
THEN For users with appropriate permissions, there will be a Pencil icon on each row of the widget
AND Clicking the icon will put the row into edit mode
AND For users with appropriate permissions, there will be an Add Doctor button at the bottom of the widget
AND Clicking the Add Doctor button will add a row to the widget
AND The new row will be editable by the user
AND Club users may only edit their own doctors

title: As a User, I want to Save the Doctors widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club

Wire:
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=doctors
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=add_doctor

Date Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Doctor+Utility+Widget+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps:
WHEN navigating to the Doctors widget
AND any of the rows in the Doctor Utility are in Edit Mode
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a Save button
AND clicking save will store the current values and the widget will reload with all rows in view mode
AND after a successful save the system will display a successful save blue notification "1 Doctor saved" , "2 Doctors saved"
AND the next time the widget is loaded, the saved values will be displayed

title: As a User, I want to Cancel All Changes to the Doctors widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club

Wire:
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=doctors
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=add_doctor

Date Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Doctor+Utility+Widget+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps:
WHEN navigating to the Doctors widget
AND any of the rows in the Doctors Utility are in Edit Mode
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a Cancel All Changes button
AND Clicking Cancel All Changes will discard all changes made to the widget
AND The widget will reload with all rows in view mode

title: As a User, I want to Delete a Row from the Doctors widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club


Wire:
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=delete_1

Date Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Doctor+Utility+Widget+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the Doctors widget
custom_expected:
THEN there is a trash can icon in each row in the Doctor Utility widget
AND clicking the icon will prompt the user to confirm they wish to remove the row
AND if they do not confirm the decision, the user will be returned to the widget and no action will be taken.
AND if the user deletes a row that has never been saved, there will be no confirmation message

title: As a User, I would like to send an Add C out for e-signature through email
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club

Wire:
https://82lvmf.axshare.com/#p=submit_mnc_for_email_e-sig
custom_steps: WHEN Clicking the esign button from an Add C
custom_expected:
THEN  a modal prompting the user to choose how the document will be esigned by each party (Player, Club Signatory) will launch
AND  The two options for players: In Person (will follow current flow), and Email
AND Each of these fields will be pre-populated with the primary email and primary phone number from the players profile
AND Each of the fields will be editable
AND  There will only be one option for Club Signatory: EBIS (will not be editable, as depicted)
AND When all required fields are complete, the Continue button will become active
AND Clicking Continue will bring the user to the esig confirmation modal, as depicted in the wire
AND There will be a cancel button on this modal
AND Clicking the cancel button will dismiss the modal without taking any action

title: As a User, I want to confirm I want to generate documents and emails for esignature
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club

Wire:
https://82lvmf.axshare.com/#p=submit_mnc_for_email_e-sig
custom_steps: WHEN generating a document for E-Sign
custom_expected:
THEN  on the initial E-sign modal, there will be a Continue button
AND clicking the Continue button will bring the user to the E-Sign confirmation modal, as depicted in the wire
AND there will be a Back button
AND clicking the Back button will bring the user back to the E-Sign set up modal
AND there will be a Continue button on the confirmation modal

title: As a User, I want ebis to send email invitations for esignature
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club

Wire:
https://82lvmf.axshare.com/#p=submit_mnc_for_email_e-sig
custom_steps: WHEN selecting a document to E-Sign
custom_expected:
THEN on the E-sign confirmation modal, there will be a Continue button
AND clicking the continue button will generate the PDFs for E-Signature 
AND send email invitations to the addresses specified in the initial E-Sign widget
AND the backend and APIs for E-Sign will be set up

title: As a User, I would like to send an NOD out for e-signature through email
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club

Wire:
https://82lvmf.axshare.com/#p=submit_mnc_for_email_e-sig
custom_steps:
WHEN navigating to an a players profile
AND Clicking the E-Sign button from an NOD
custom_expected:
THEN a modal prompting the user to choose how the document will be E-Signed by each party (Player, Club Signatory) will launch
AND The two options for players:
-- In Person (will follow current flow)
-- Email
AND there will be only one option for Club Signatory:
-- EBIS (will not be editable, as depicted)
AND when Email is selected for the player, the following required fields will appear:
-- Email
-- Phone
AND each of these fields will be pre-populated with the primary email and primary phone number from the players profile
AND each of the fields will be editable
AND when all required fields are complete, the Continue button will become active
And there will be a cancel button on this modal
AND clicking the cancel button will dismiss the modal without taking any action

title: Please add "Printed Contract Title" object to the view for Salary Survey - BOC Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC
custom_steps:
WHEN navigating to Reports
AND viewing a Salary Survey report
custom_expected:
THEN verify "Printed Contract Title" object was added to the view for Salary Survey - BOC
AND the printed contract title is currently on the front end and needs to be added to the view for this report 
AND the report uses the following view: SALARY_SURVEY_RPT_VIEW
AND this should be done on the BOC version of the report only

title: Please add "Printed Contract Title" object to the Salary Survey - BOC Report
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is on the reports widget

The printed contract title is currently on the front end and needs to be added to the view for this report. The report uses the following view: SALARY_SURVEY_RPT_VIEW
custom_steps: WHEN running the Salary Survey report
custom_expected:
THEN "Printed Contract Title" object will be added to the view for Salary Survey - BOC
AND this should be done on the BOC version of the report only.

title: As a User, I want to see a ML Base column added to MNC Advanced Search
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club

SNOW: INC0120973

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Search+-+Minor+Contracts
custom_steps:
WHEN navigating to Advanced Search
AND running an Advanced Search with a search type of Minor Contracts
custom_expected:
THEN "ML Base" will be return as a result column
AND the column will be populated with the Major League Base Salary included in the Minor Contract

title: As a User, I want PlayerID exported to excel from Advanced Search
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
custom_steps:
WHEN executing an Advanced Search on:
-- Add C
-- Add D
-- CSP/CEP Invoice
-- CSP/CEP Player Summary
-- Domestic Amateur Player
-- Employee
-- Employee Contract
-- Employee Transactions
-- Intl Amateur Player
-- Intl Player Report
-- Investigations
-- MJC
-- MNC
-- Pro Player
-- Transactions
-- Waivers
-- Winter League Requests
custom_expected:
THEN all Advanced Search types will provide the option to export search results to Excel
AND Excel exports for any search type that returns a player name, will now feature eBis PlayerID in the first column


Note:  This story will not impact result columns in the app, only the excel exports

title: As a BOC Reg Admin User, I want to Edit the Investigation Type on Submitted Investigation Requests
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC
AND has BOC Reg Admin rights

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Investigation+Form

JIRA: EBISII-16489
SNOW: INC0120558
custom_steps: WHEN an Investigation Request is in submitted state
custom_expected:
THEN BOC Reg Admin users will be able to edit the Investigation Type field
AND the field will not be editable once the Investigation request is Approved
AND Club Users will not be able to edit this field when the Request is in Submitted state

title: As a User, I don't want alternate cash considerations for a PTBNL cannot exceed $100,000
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
custom_steps: WHEN executing a trade involving one or more PTBNL
custom_expected:
THEN the amount of cash that can be included in a trade as alternate cash consideration for a PTBNL cannot exceed $100,000.  
AND If a trade includes more than one PTBNL, the total amount of alternate cash consideration tied to all PTBNL may not exceed $100,000

title: 48 Hour Restriction on Asking OR waivers on a claimed player
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as a CLUB
custom_steps: WHEN try to claim a player on OR waivers before the 48hour period is over
custom_expected:
THEN the claiming club will not be allowed to ask for OR waivers on a player until 48 hours have elapsed from the time of the trade.
AND Allow a BOC override in the event they allow the club to ask OR waivers within that timeframe.
AND Driven by waiver request bulletin

title: Update `Count FA` column in Contract History to calculate based off the new table
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
AND a player has minor league service
custom_steps:
WHEN navigating to a player profile
AND viewing their Contract History
custom_expected:
THEN the `Count FA` column in Contract History will be changed to calculate based off the new table that was added 
(PRO_MN_YEARLY_SERVICE) instead of addendum Cs
AND same with the `Contract Years Remaining` field on the Single C....   these fields will now be service based as opposed to addendum c based
AND every Contract Year a player has he also has an accompanying Addendum C for the year

title: Update Contract Year Remaining field on Single Cs to calculate based off new table
custom_steps: WHEN changing the "Count FA" column in Contract History
custom_expected:
THEN calculations will be made based off the new table we added (PRO_MN_YEARLY_SERVICE) instead of addendum Cs.  
AND same with the "Contract Years Remaining" field on the Single C.
AND these fields will now be service based as opposed to addendum C based

title: As a User, I no longer want Mexican Assignment Agreements to be a part of MNCs
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club


Business Rules:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/5.+Minor+Contract+-+onSubmit

Note: None of the Mexican Assignment Agreement related rules appear to ever have been implemented

Additional note regarding ISB calcs:
Mexican signings will no longer utilize assignment agreements. In some cases there will be a release fee paid to the Mexican Club, but that fee will be paid separately from the bonus and so would not need to be included in the ISB calculation.
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to International First-Year Minor League Contracts or Non-First Year Minor League Contracts
custom_expected:
THEN there will no longer be a Mexican Assignment Agreement section that can be added to International First-Year Minor League Contracts
AND there will no longer be a Mexican Assignment Agreement section that can be added to Non-First Year Minor League Contracts
AND existing contracts will not be affected by this change

title: Signed for Next Year: 50 per org rather than 12 per level
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC/Club
custom_steps:
WHEN navigating to the MJ Summary page (for BOC)
AND the MJ / MN roster page (for each club)
custom_expected:
THEN the SFNY designation will be retained
AND 12 per level cap will be removed
AND  50 SFNY per org will be implemented
AND Clubs should not be able to exceed 50 such players
AND the number of SFNY players for the MJ summary (BOC) will be displayed
AND the number of SFNY players for the MJ/MN roster page (for each club) will be displayed

title: As a BOC User, I want to filter for "Recently Passed Over" player contracts on my Pending Approvals Clipboard
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to the BOC Pending Approval Clipboard
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a new "Recently Passed Over" option in the Minor Contract Type filter of the BOC's pending approval clipboard
AND choosing this filter will only show minor contracts for players who had a R4 Draft Status of Passed Over for the **most recent draft**

title: Create a proper 404 page
custom_steps: For invalid URLs, the current behavior is that the app loads the Rosters page with blank content.   Since this is not particularly helpful for the user, we should create a view for 404 pages.  We can then tag this page in Omniture as a error page, which may give us insight into broken links/paths.
